roadmapItems.title: Release 1.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Initial release with basic workflow automation and enterprise system integration.

children.title: Basic Workflow Automation
children.description: Introducing basic workflow automation features.

children.title: Resolved issues with trigger execution.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the execution of workflow triggers.

children.title: Fixed bugs in condition evaluation.
children.description: Corrected errors in evaluating workflow conditions.

children.title: Added support for multiple trigger types.
children.description: Introduced support for various types of workflow triggers.

children.title: Improved error handling and logging.
children.description: Enhanced error handling and logging mechanisms for workflows.

children.title: Integration with Enterprise Systems
children.description: Integrating with major enterprise systems for better connectivity.

children.title: Corrected issues with system connectivity.
children.description: Fixed connectivity issues with enterprise systems.

children.title: Fixed bugs in data synchronization.
children.description: Resolved problems affecting data synchronization between systems.

children.title: Added support for SAP and Oracle integrations.
children.description: Introduced integration support for SAP and Oracle systems.

children.title: Improved API response times.
children.description: Enhanced the response times of the API for better performance.

roadmapItems.title: Release 1.2.0
roadmapItems.description: Enhancing rule-based automation and security features.

children.title: Advanced Rule-Based Automation
children.description: Introducing advanced features for rule-based workflow automation.

children.title: Resolved issues with nested rules.
children.description: Fixed problems with nested rule execution.

children.title: Fixed bugs in rule validation.
children.description: Corrected errors in validating workflow rules.

children.title: Introduced complex rule chaining.
children.description: Added support for chaining multiple rules together.

children.title: Added support for time-based rules.
children.description: Introduced rules that can be triggered based on time.

children.title: Enhanced Security
children.description: Improving security features for API access.

children.title: Fixed vulnerabilities in API authentication.
children.description: Resolved security vulnerabilities in the authentication process.

children.title: Corrected issues with data encryption.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting data encryption.

children.title: Implemented OAuth2 for secure API access.
children.description: Added OAuth2 support for secure access to the API.

children.title: Added support for IP whitelisting.
children.description: Introduced IP whitelisting to restrict access to the API.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major update with dynamic workflow creation, analytics, and scalability improvements.

children.title: Dynamic Workflow Creation
children.description: Introducing features for dynamic creation of workflows.

children.title: Resolved bugs in dynamic workflow generation.
children.description: Fixed issues with generating dynamic workflows.

children.title: Fixed issues with workflow versioning.
children.description: Resolved problems affecting the versioning of workflows.

children.title: Introduced a drag-and-drop interface for workflow design.
children.description: Added a drag-and-drop interface for designing workflows.

children.title: Added support for workflow templates.
children.description: Introduced templates to simplify workflow creation.

children.title: Analytics and Reporting
children.description: Enhancing analytics and reporting features for better insights.

children.title: Corrected issues with data aggregation.
children.description: Fixed problems with aggregating data for reports.

children.title: Fixed bugs in report generation.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting the generation of reports.

children.title: Added real-time workflow performance analytics.
children.description: Introduced real-time analytics for monitoring workflow performance.

children.title: Implemented customizable reporting features.
children.description: Added customizable options for generating reports.

children.title: Scalability Improvements
children.description: Enhancing scalability to handle high-volume requests.

children.title: Resolved performance bottlenecks.
children.description: Fixed issues causing performance bottlenecks in the system.

children.title: Fixed issues with concurrent workflow executions.
children.description: Resolved problems with executing workflows concurrently.

children.title: Improved API scalability to handle high-volume requests.
children.description: Enhanced the API to manage a high volume of requests.

children.title: Added support for distributed processing.
children.description: Introduced support for distributed processing of workflows.

roadmapItems.title: Release 2.3.0
roadmapItems.description: Focused on enhancing integration capabilities and user management.

children.title: Enhanced Integration Capabilities
children.description: Improving integration features for better connectivity.

children.title: Resolved issues with third-party API integrations.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting integrations with third-party APIs.

children.title: Fixed bugs in webhook handling.
children.description: Resolved issues with handling webhooks.

children.title: Added support for additional enterprise systems.
children.description: Introduced support for integrating more enterprise systems.

children.title: Improved integration setup and management.
children.description: Enhanced the process of setting up and managing integrations.

children.title: User Management
children.description: Introducing advanced user management features.

children.title: Fixed issues with user role assignments.
children.description: Resolved problems affecting the assignment of user roles.

children.title: Resolved bugs in permission settings.
children.description: Fixed issues with setting user permissions.

children.title: Introduced role-based access control.
children.description: Added role-based access control for better security.

children.title: Added support for multi-tenant user management.
children.description: Introduced features for managing users across multiple tenants.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.0.0
roadmapItems.description: Major update with AI-driven automation, mobile access, and compliance.

children.title: AI-Driven Automation
children.description: Introducing AI features for advanced workflow automation.

children.title: Corrected issues with AI model integration.
children.description: Fixed problems with integrating AI models.

children.title: Fixed bugs in AI-driven decision making.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting AI-driven decisions in workflows.

children.title: Introduced machine learning for predictive workflows.
children.description: Added machine learning features to enable predictive workflows.

children.title: Added support for natural language processing in rule definitions.
children.description: Introduced NLP to simplify the definition of workflow rules.

children.title: Mobile Access
children.description: Enhancing mobile access to workflow management features.

children.title: Resolved issues with mobile API calls.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting API calls from mobile devices.

children.title: Improved mobile API performance.
children.description: Enhanced the performance of the API when accessed from mobile devices.

children.title: Added mobile-specific features for workflow management.
children.description: Introduced features for managing workflows specifically from mobile devices.

children.title: Compliance and Audit
children.description: Implementing features to ensure compliance and detailed auditing.

children.title: Corrected issues with audit trail generation.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the generation of audit trails.

children.title: Fixed bugs in compliance reporting.
children.description: Resolved issues affecting compliance report generation.

children.title: Implemented comprehensive audit logging.
children.description: Introduced detailed logging for auditing purposes.

children.title: Added support for industry-specific compliance standards.
children.description: Introduced features to meet various industry compliance standards.

roadmapItems.title: Release 3.2.0
roadmapItems.description: Focused on advanced monitoring, alerts, and custom scripting.

children.title: Advanced Monitoring and Alerts
children.description: Introducing advanced features for monitoring workflows and alerts.

children.title: Resolved issues with alert triggers.
children.description: Fixed problems affecting the triggering of alerts.

children.title: Fixed bugs in monitoring dashboards.
children.description: Resolved issues with the monitoring dashboards.

children.title: Introduced customizable alerts and notifications.
children.description: Added features for creating customizable alerts and notifications.

children.title: Added support for real-time monitoring of workflow status.
children.description: Introduced real-time monitoring for tracking the status of workflows.

children.title: Custom Scripting
children.description: Enhancing workflow automation with custom scripting capabilities.

children.title: Fixed issues with script execution.
children.description: Resolved problems affecting the execution of custom scripts.

children.title: Resolved bugs in script debugging.
children.description: Fixed issues affecting the debugging of custom scripts.

children.title: Added support for custom scripts in workflow automation.
children.description: Introduced support for adding custom scripts to workflows.

children.title: Improved script management and version control.
children.description: Enhanced management and version control for custom scripts.
